channel.title: Commands in 1 file or hashmap?
channel.description:
Would it better to put all commands in a hashmap and make an entire class for each class kept inside it's own folder, or keep them in 1 class.
Considering organization, efficiency etc. What would you prefer?

item.title: Commands in 1 file or hashmap?
item.dc:creator: @omgitsbob12 omgitsbob12
item.description:
@omgitsbob12 wrote:

Yeah I don’t have to many commands but i’m just wondering which method would be better to handle the commands. I also was thinking of making 3 files and splitting the type of commands, like playercommands.java, modcommands etc. Would use a switch with cases to send each file.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands in 1 file or hashmap?
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

tbh i dont even use commands, theres like 16 commands in my server, the mod commands and admin commands plus givemod and giveadmin and giverdonor and givesdonor
